dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT s.start_time, TO_CHAR(s.start_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') ship_dt, (CASE WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value = 'I955' THEN '102012' WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value = 'SPCS' THEN '1010427' WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value = 'SHME' THEN '102017' ELSE sref1.shipment_refnum_value END) commodity, (CASE WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value = 'I955' THEN 'Salmon Meal' WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value = 'SPCS' THEN 'Salmon Hydrolysate' WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value = 'SHME' THEN 'Shrimp Meal' ELSE sref1.shipment_refnum_value END) commodity_name, (SELECT glog_util.remove_domain(ssul.order_base_gid) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) contract_no, loc1.location_name manufacturer, loc1.city || ', ' || loc1.province_code origin, loc2.city || ', ' || loc2.province_code destination, loc2.location_name destination_name, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_net_weight_base,0),'999,999,990')) weight_shipped, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_net_weight_base,0),'999,999,990')) adjustment, (SELECT oob.inco_term_gid FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) inco_term, '$' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_actual_cost_base,0),'999,999,990')) freight, '$' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(TO_NUMBER((SELECT oref.ob_refnum_value FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum oref ON oob.order_base_gid = oref.order_base_gid AND ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CONTRACT_PRICE' WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1)),2),'999,999,990.00')) || ' / ' || (SELECT oref.ob_refnum_value FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum oref ON oob.order_base_gid = oref.order_base_gid AND ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.PRICE_UOM' WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) price, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SELECT oob.total_weight_base FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid) - NVL((SELECT TO_NUMBER(oref.ob_refnum_value) FROM shipment_s_equipment_join ssej INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_refnum oref ON ssul.order_base_gid = oref.order_base_gid AND oref.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.AS400_APPLIED_QTY' WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),0)),0),'999,999,990')) remaining FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' INNER JOIN location loc ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CUSTOMER PO NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CUSTOMER PO RELEASE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND loc.location_name = 'BLUE BUFFALO COMPANY LTD' AND (TO_DATE(s.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(s.start_time,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (NVL(:INSERT_FROM,:INSERT_TO) IS NULL OR (NOT NVL(:INSERT_FROM,:INSERT_TO) IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(NVL(:INSERT_FROM,:INSERT_TO),'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND TO_DATE(s.insert_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(NVL(:INSERT_TO,:INSERT_FROM),'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:PO_NUMBER IS NULL OR (NOT :PO_NUMBER IS NULL AND (sref2.shipment_refnum_value LIKE '%' || :PO_NUMBER || '%'))) AND (:PO_RELEASE IS NULL OR (NOT :PO_RELEASE IS NULL AND (sref3.shipment_refnum_value LIKE '%' || :PO_RELEASE || '%'))) ORDER BY s.start_time, contract_no
